channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Planet Earth
channel.desc: Documentary series which celebrates earth in all its glory. This edition follows the descent of the planet's mightiest rivers from their mountain sources to the sea.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: What Are UFOs?
channel.desc: After years in the shadows, UFOs are being studied seriously. Follow scientists as they try to unravel the mystery of the strangest objects in our skies.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Gangland Lemurs - Wildlife on One
channel.desc: A look at the life of ring-tailed lemurs on the African island of Madagascar, who live in female-dominated gangs and continually fight for territory with their neighbours.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Tribe
channel.desc: Explorer Bruce Parry takes part in the initiation rite of the Babongo tribe of Gabon. Contains graphic scenes of drug use.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Eileen Atkins Remembers... Mrs Dalloway
channel.desc: Dame Eileen Atkins tells the story of her lifelong fascination with Virginia Woolf and recalls how she took on the challenge of adapting Woolf's Mrs Dalloway for the big screen.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Mrs Dalloway
channel.desc: An adaptation of the classic Virginia Woolf novel. A woman struggles to come to terms with the amorous feelings that a close platonic friend clearly holds for her.
